org.apache.flink.api.common.typeutils

类 TypeSerializerSerializationUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.api.common.typeutils.TypeSerializerSerializationUtil

  • @Internal
public class TypeSerializerSerializationUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods for serialization of TypeSerializer and TypeSerializerConfigSnapshot.

    • 方法详细资料

      • writeSerializer

        public static <T> void writeSerializer(DataOutputView out,
                                       TypeSerializer<T> serializer)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        Writes a TypeSerializer to the provided data output view.

        It is written with a format that can be later read again using tryReadSerializer(DataInputView, ClassLoader, boolean).

        类型参数:
        T - Data type of the serializer.
        参数:
        out - the data output view.
        serializer - the serializer to write.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • tryReadSerializer

        public static <T> TypeSerializer<T> tryReadSerializer(DataInputView in,
                                                      java.lang.ClassLoader userCodeClassLoader)
        Reads from a data input view a TypeSerializer that was previously written using writeSerializer(DataOutputView, TypeSerializer).

        If deserialization fails for any reason (corrupted serializer bytes, serializer class no longer in classpath, serializer class no longer valid, etc.), null will be returned instead.

        类型参数:
        T - Data type of the serializer.
        参数:
        in - the data input view.
        userCodeClassLoader - the user code class loader to use.
        返回:
        the deserialized serializer.

      • tryReadSerializer

        public static <T> TypeSerializer<T> tryReadSerializer(DataInputView in,
                                                      java.lang.ClassLoader userCodeClassLoader,
                                                      boolean useDummyPlaceholder)
        Reads from a data input view a TypeSerializer that was previously written using writeSerializer(DataOutputView, TypeSerializer).

        If deserialization fails due to ClassNotFoundException or InvalidClassException, users can opt to use a dummy UnloadableDummyTypeSerializer to hold the serializer bytes, otherwise null is returned. If the failure is due to a StreamCorruptedException, then null is returned.

        类型参数:
        T - Data type of the serializer.
        参数:
        in - the data input view.
        userCodeClassLoader - the user code class loader to use.
        useDummyPlaceholder - whether or not to use a dummy UnloadableDummyTypeSerializer to hold the serializer bytes in the case of a ClassNotFoundException or InvalidClassException.
        返回:
        the deserialized serializer.

      • writeSerializersAndConfigsWithResilience

        public static void writeSerializersAndConfigsWithResilience(DataOutputView out,
                                                            java.util.List<Tuple2<TypeSerializer<?>,TypeSerializerConfigSnapshot>> serializersAndConfigs)
                                                     throws java.io.IOException
        Write a list of serializers and their corresponding config snapshots to the provided data output view. This method writes in a fault tolerant way, so that when read again using readSerializersAndConfigsWithResilience(DataInputView, ClassLoader), if deserialization of the serializer fails, its configuration snapshot will remain intact.

        Specifically, all written serializers and their config snapshots are indexed by their offset positions within the serialized bytes. The serialization format is as follows:

        • 1. number of serializer and configuration snapshot pairs.
        • 2. offsets of each serializer and configuration snapshot, in order.
        • 3. total number of bytes for the serialized serializers and the config snapshots.
        • 4. serialized serializers and the config snapshots.
        参数:
        out - the data output view.
        serializersAndConfigs - serializer and configuration snapshot pairs
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • readSerializersAndConfigsWithResilience

        public static java.util.List<Tuple2<TypeSerializer<?>,TypeSerializerConfigSnapshot>> readSerializersAndConfigsWithResilience(DataInputView in,
                                                                                                                             java.lang.ClassLoader userCodeClassLoader)
                                                                                                                      throws java.io.IOException
        Reads from a data input view a list of serializers and their corresponding config snapshots written using writeSerializersAndConfigsWithResilience(DataOutputView, List). This is fault tolerant to any failures when deserializing the serializers. Serializers which were not successfully deserialized will be replaced by null.
        参数:
        in - the data input view.
        userCodeClassLoader - the user code class loader to use.
        返回:
        the deserialized serializer and config snapshot pairs.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • writeSerializerConfigSnapshot

        public static void writeSerializerConfigSnapshot(DataOutputView out,
                                                 TypeSerializerConfigSnapshot serializerConfigSnapshot)
                                          throws java.io.IOException
        Writes a TypeSerializerConfigSnapshot to the provided data output view.

        It is written with a format that can be later read again using readSerializerConfigSnapshot(DataInputView, ClassLoader).

        参数:
        out - the data output view
        serializerConfigSnapshot - the serializer configuration snapshot to write
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • readSerializerConfigSnapshot

        public static TypeSerializerConfigSnapshot readSerializerConfigSnapshot(DataInputView in,
                                                                        java.lang.ClassLoader userCodeClassLoader)
                                                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Reads from a data input view a TypeSerializerConfigSnapshot that was previously written using writeSerializerConfigSnapshot(DataOutputView, TypeSerializerConfigSnapshot).
        参数:

        userCodeClassLoader - the user code class loader to use
        返回:
        the read serializer configuration snapshot
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

        public static void writeSerializerConfigSnapshots(DataOutputView out,
                                                  TypeSerializerConfigSnapshot... serializerConfigSnapshots)
                                           throws java.io.IOException
        Writes multiple TypeSerializerConfigSnapshots to the provided data output view.

        It is written with a format that can be later read again using readSerializerConfigSnapshots(DataInputView, ClassLoader).

        参数:

        serializerConfigSnapshots - the serializer configuration snapshots to write
        抛出:
